channel.title: Evie on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Evie on Game6r

item.title: Evie game - New Year's breakfast
item.description: After starting this game, you will see a couple in love. Come up with cute images for a girl and a guy. To do this, you will have all the necessary tools at your disposal. It will be enough for the guy to change the outfit, but the girl wants to get a suitable make-up and hairstyle in addition to new clothes.

item.title: Evie's birthday game
item.description: Go to a fun holiday party to have a great time there and help the girl complete various tasks. For the right actions will be given rewards - different things for the heroine of the game. With their help, you can come up with new images for her, changing her hairstyle, makeup, clothes, accessories.
